懤懤懤

懤字的基本解释

懤
chóu
〔懤懤〕深深的忧愁。

懤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chóu］
［《廣韻》直由切，平尤，澄。］
［《廣韻》都晧切，上晧，端。］
［《廣韻》直祐切，去宥，澄。］
忧。参见“懤懤”。

懤字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懤； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页407第02
【廣韻】直由切【集韻】?留切，?音儔。【廣韻】愁毒貌。【王褒·九懷】泱莽兮究志，懼吾心兮懤懤。　又【集韻】丈九切，音紂。義同。　又【集韻】覩老切，音倒。憂也。　又【集韻】直祐切，音胄。愁毒也。

懤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
懤字的起名意思

暂无。

Ignorant
Basic explanation of words
Ignorant
chóu
[懤懤] Deep sadness.
Ignorant
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chóu］
["Guang Yun" straight from the cut, Ping You, Cheng. ]
["Guangyun" are all cut, upper and end. ]
["Guangyun" cut straight, go to you, and clear. ]
worry. See "懤懤".
Ignorant
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　懤; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 407 02
[Guang Yun] Straight from the cut [Ji Yun]? Stay cut,? Sound. [Guang Yun] melancholy appearance. 【Wang Bao·Jiuhuai】I am reckless and ambitious, and I am afraid of my heart.　[Jiyun] Zhang Jiuqie, the sound is 纣. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] The old cut, the sound is inverted. Worry too.　[Jiyun] Zhiyou cut, sound. Sadness too.
